abstract: To hear Jeffrey R. Immelt, General Electric’s chief executive, tell it, his company is having a great 2007 and faces a very nice 2008. Yet investors are skeptical.
snippet: To hear Jeffrey R. Immelt, General Electric’s chief executive, tell it, his company is having a great 2007 and faces a very nice 2008. Yet investors are skeptical.
lead_paragraph: To hear Jeffrey R. Immelt, General Electric’s chief executive, tell it, his company is having a great 2007 and faces a very nice 2008.

headline.main: Chief Says G.E. Profit Will Grow 10% or More
headline.print_headline: Chief Says G.E. Profit Will Grow 10% or More
